definitions: the position of a student or trainee who works in an organization, sometimes without pay, in order to gain work experience or satisfy requirements for a qualification

examples.text: they encouraged students to apply for newspaper internships

shortDefinitions: position of student or trainee who works in organization

definitions: the position of a medical intern in a hospital

examples.text: he served his medical internship at Southern Pacific Hospital

shortDefinitions: position of medical intern in hospital
